feeler_front_multiplier.description: Multiplier of the avoidance due to front feeler.

feeler_front_down_multiplier.description: Multiplier of the avoidance due to front down feeler.

feeler_side_multiplier.description: Multiplier of the avoidance due to side feeler.

feeler_front_length.description: The length of the front feeler ('vision').

feeler_front_down_length.description: The length of the front down feeler ('vision').

feeler_side_length.description: The length of the side feelers.

goal_attraction_multiplier_fastflight.description: Multiplier of the force towards the goal when using fast flight.

goal_attraction_multiplier_hover.description: Multiplier of the force towards the goal when using hover.

curve_attraction_multiplier.description: Multiplier of the force towards the path curve (set by behaviors when e.g. attacking).

curve_lookahead_distance.description: How far along the curve the attraction point will be put.

preferred_height_above_ground_min.description: Minimum height of the preferred height. When below this, the boid will strive upwards.

preferred_height_above_ground_max.description: Maximum height of the preferred height. When above this, the boid will strive downwards.

ground_avoidance_multiplier.description: Multiplies the force that pushes boids upwards if they are below their minimum preferred height.

sky_avoidance_multiplier.description: Multiplies the force that pushes boids downwards if they are above their maximum preferred height.

max_acceleration_tilt.description: Max vertical tilt in degrees based on acceleration/deceleration.

acceleration_banking_speed.description: The speed at which apply acceleration tilt.

feelers_front_node.description: [string]Name of the node that the front feelers are fired from. Defaults to root.

feelers_front_down_node.description: [string]Name of the node that the front down feelers are fired from. Defaults to root.

slerp_rotation_during_follow_path.description: [bool]True if the boid should slerp toward the final curve-point rotation.

feelers_front.description: [bool]True if we should use the front feeler.

feelers_front_down.description: [bool]True if we should use the front down feeler.

feelers_front_right.description: [bool]True if we should use the front right feeler.

feelers_front_left.description: [bool]True if we should use the front left feeler.

use_banking.description: [bool]True if the entity should bank (or 'tilt') depending on velocity. If false, the entity will always stay upright.

view_radius.description: The radius of the neighborhood. The volume where the flyer will sense other flyers.

optimal_distance.description: The distance away from other flyers it will strive towards.

seperation_multiplier.description: Multiplier of the seperation force (away from other flyers).

quadcopter_movement.description: [bool]Uses the motion velocity to point the boid feelers and does not manually rotate the entity.

attraction_force_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the attraction force, making the boid adjust velocity faster.

attraction_force_landing_square.description: The amount we square the attraction force with when landing.

attraction_force_landing_minimum.description: The minimum speed of the attraction force when landing.
